RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SELECT DISK=0&echo:CLEAN&echo:CONVERT GPT&echo:REM WinRE Partition (500MB, with special TypeID^)&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY SIZE=500&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL=^"WinRE^")"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SET ID=DE94BBA4-06D1-4D40-A16A-BFD50179D6AC&echo:GPT ATTRIBUTES=0x8000000000000001&echo:REM EFI System Partition (100MB^)&echo:CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=100&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL=^"System^")"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:REM MSR (16MB^)&echo:CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16&echo:REM Windows partition (remaining space^)&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL=^"Windows^")"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"

Extensions.File:
HKU = &H80000003 Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If reg.EnumKey(HKU, "", sids) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(sids) Then For Each sid In sids key = sid + "\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer" name = "LockedStartLayout" If reg.GetDWORDValue(HKU, key, name, existing) = 0 Then reg.SetDWORDValue HKU, key, name, 0 End If Next End If End If
